doc:
Shirley Mills https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shirley_Mills 0 Shirley Olivia Mills (April 8, 1926 – March 31, 2010) was an American actress. She played the roles of the youngest daughter in The Grapes of Wrath and the title character in Child Bride. In the latter, she is shown nude in a nude swimming scene, filmed when she was about 12 years old, which became the basis for Child Bride being classified for many years as an exploitation film. Shirley_Olivia_Mills ( April_8_,_1926 – March_31_,_2010 ) was an_American_actress . She played the_roles of the_youngest_daughter in The_Grapes of Wrath and the_title_character in Child_Bride . In the_latter , she is_shown nude in a_nude_swimming_scene , filmed when she was about_12_years old , which became the_basis for Child_Bride being_classified for many_years as an_exploitation_film .
